status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
Hi,

Any method I choose To install I ran to some problem (R-4.1.1. and R-4.1.2):

# The normal install:

{noformat}
- re2_ep download command succeeded.  See also /tmp/RtmpRvCCWr/file3fbda77af639/re2_ep-prefix/src/re2_ep-stamp/re2_ep-download-*.log
